discourse_list.title: Introducing OP Launcher to Optimism World

content.content: Project Name: OP Launcher  Author Name: Jane Guinevere  GM Optimism Community I would like to introduce you to OP Launcher, a Decentralized Launchpad Built on Optimism. OPLauncher is a decentralized launchpad that allows users to launch their own token and create their own initial token sale. No deep knowledge of fund-raising is required, just simply navigate to our terminal and design your own token in just a few clicks. OPLauncher offers multiple other features to help you have an overall token launch, such as: Automatically listing your token on Velodrome Dex, locking Project’s token and LP to protect investors. OPLauncher provides 4 features features with everything you need to launch a project, purchase tokens from our launchpad, simply stake your tokens, and so on. Ultimately we are a Blockchain tech provider.    Launchpad : The place for developers can launch their projects and investors can join profit potential ones.    Staking: Tier system and earn protocol revenue.    Create Token: Create ERC-20 standard token.    Lock Liquidity / Token: Lock project’s Liquidity/Token.   We have done 2 Testnets on Optimism Goerli and prepared for mainnet stage. Listing on Coinmarketcap, Dapp Radar,… We hope to receive support from everyone. OPLauncher - Decentralized Launchpad
